text: Seema Verma (born September 27, 1970) is an American health policy consultant. She was the Administrator of the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services, serving under the Trump Administration from 2017 to 2021. She is the founder and CEO of SVC Inc., a health policy consulting firm. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official biography from SVC Inc. * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Indiana Category:Johns Hopkins University alumni Category:Politicians from Indiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Seema Verma
